Text: Thanks for giving it a go. You'll need to deinterlace the video before encoding it however - it will increase the quality 10-fold and get rid of all those little horizontal lines. Google "deinterlace" and find a way to make it progressive instead for the next race =)
Thanks for the tip, i will try to. But it would be better if Slicknick continued with his HD-releases, he's the man :)
